content: a lovely but surprisingly easy headband perfect for all the odd balls of wool that are just sat looking at you longingly from your stash you can use double knitting light worsted aran worsted chunky bulky or super chunky/bulky as instructions are given for all these plies along with a clear guide on how to adapt them to any head there is only one seam and 2 ends that will need to be woven in so virtually no sew i hope you enjoy making them as much as i did they make up really quickly and are surprisingly addictive 8 page photo tutorial beginner/ lower intermediate level © teri hamilton crochet@teri s 2024 this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is permitted to make items from this pattern provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited
